video.title: ST: DS9
video.synopsis: In this "Star Trek" spin-off, Commander Sisko leads the multi-species crew of Deep Space Nine, a Federation space station with a complex mission.

episodes.synopsis: When the troubled Cmdr. Sisko takes command of a surrendered space station, he learns that it borders a unique stable wormhole.
episodes.title: Emissary: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: The adjustment period aboard Deep Space Nine continues as transplants from across the galaxy attempt to come to terms with their lives and each other.
episodes.title: A Man Alone

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Bashir is excited to meet Garak, the last Cardassian aboard Deep Space Nine and a rumored spy.
episodes.title: Past Prologue

episodes.synopsis: Frustrated by all of the mechanical problems on the space station, O'Brien attempts to fix the food replicators.
episodes.title: Babel

episodes.synopsis: While listening to a complaint about Quark's lascivious behavior, Sisko is alerted that an alien vessel is coming through the wormhole.
episodes.title: Captive Pursuit

episodes.synopsis: The officers struggle to save the station from imminent destruction.
episodes.title: Q-Less

episodes.synopsis: Lt. Dax, preparing to return to her quarters for the evening, is being observed by a male Trill named Selin Peers.
episodes.title: Dax

episodes.synopsis: Traveling in a Runabout, Kira and Bashir pick up a distress signal from a disabled Kobliad ship.
episodes.title: The Passenger

episodes.synopsis: Cmdr. Sisko, in dress uniform, prepares to receive the first formal alien delegation from the Gamma Quadrant.
episodes.title: Move Along Home

episodes.synopsis: Quark is approached by a Ferengi named Krax, who presents his father, Grand Nagus Zek, the revered leader of the Ferengi business empire.
episodes.title: The Nagus

episodes.synopsis: While haggling with a pair of Miradorns over a valuable goblet, Quark is interrupted by a newly arrived alien demanding the goblet for himself.
episodes.title: Vortex

episodes.synopsis: Kai Opaka, Bajor's spiritual leader, pays a surprise visit to the station.
episodes.title: Battle Lines

episodes.synopsis: Sisko and Kira play host on the space station to the leaders of two rival Bajoran factions -- the Paqu and the Navot.
episodes.title: The Storyteller

episodes.synopsis: With the Federation's help, the Bajoran government is about to perform a massive energy transfer by tapping the molten core of its fifth moon.
episodes.title: Progress

episodes.synopsis: Sisko, Kira and Dax investigate readings of unusually high thoron emissions coming from the plasma field in their area of space.
episodes.title: If Wishes Were Horses

episodes.synopsis: Bashir plays reluctant host to a delegation of Federation ambassadors, one of whom happens to be Lwaxana Troi, mother of Deanna Troi.
episodes.title: The Forsaken

episodes.synopsis: Kira protests when Sisko allows a Valerian ship to dock at the station.
episodes.title: Dramatis Personae

episodes.synopsis: A Kobheerian freighter transports a passenger who has a medical condition known as Kalla-Nohra.
episodes.title: Duet

episodes.synopsis: A Bajoran woman in religious garb observes Keiko O'Brien's class and calmly objects to Keiko's secular methods of instruction.
episodes.title: In the Hands of Prophets

episodes.synopsis: Kira is intrigued when Quark presents her with an earring he claims was delivered from Cardassia Four.
episodes.title: The Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: After Minister Jaro dismisses Maj. Kira and sends her back to Bajor, Sisko angrily confronts him about his actions.
episodes.title: The Circle

episodes.synopsis: With less than five hours remaining before Bajoran forces are due to arrive, Sisko continues to evacuate Deep Space Nine.
episodes.title: The Siege

episodes.synopsis: A violent plasma storm leads to the evacuation of Deep Space Nine, leaving a skeleton crew behind to maintain the station.
episodes.title: Invasive Procedures

episodes.synopsis: Bashir is surprised when his "friend" Garak, a Cardassian tailor, is attacked and bitten by a Cardassian boy.
episodes.title: Cardassians

episodes.synopsis: The crew welcomes Ensign Melora Pazlar, a cartographer on a mission to chart the Gamma Quadrant.
episodes.title: Melora

episodes.synopsis: While engaging in a game of Tongo with Rom, Dax and a young Ferengi waiter, Quark is hailed by his leader, Grand Nagus Zek, who has good news for him.
episodes.title: Rules of Acquisition

episodes.synopsis: A beautiful Bajoran woman calls Quark to Bajor and persuades him to retrieve a strongbox that her late husband kept hidden on Deep Space Nine.
episodes.title: Necessary Evil

episodes.synopsis: On the fourth anniversary of his wife's death, Sisko takes a melancholy late-night stroll along the Promenade.
episodes.title: Second Sight

episodes.synopsis: When a ramshackle alien vessel is detected making its way through the wormhole, the ship's four passengers are transported to Deep Space Nine.
episodes.title: Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: Over a drink at Quark's, a middle-aged alien widow tells an alien man how she plans to invest her life savings in a large mining concession.
episodes.title: Rivals

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Mora Pol arrives on Deep Space Nine with the announcement that he may have a clue to Odo's origins.
episodes.title: The Alternate

episodes.synopsis: Bashir and O'Brien travel to a lab orbiting T'Lani Three in an effort to eliminate the Harvesters -- a deadly biomechanical weapon.
episodes.title: Armageddon Game

episodes.synopsis: After returning from an assignment in the Paradas system, O'Brien notices that everyone on the station is treating him differently.
episodes.title: Whispers

episodes.synopsis: While surveying nearby star systems for M-Class planets, Sisko and O'Brien locate a planet that already supports a colony of humans.
episodes.title: Paradise

episodes.synopsis: In the Gamma Quadrant, Dax and Odo detect an unusual particle field on the surface of an unexplored planet.
episodes.title: Shadow Play

episodes.synopsis: Arjin, a Trill initiate trying to qualify for joining with a symbiont, is nervous that he must study under Dax.
episodes.title: Playing God

episodes.synopsis: Sisko and the Ops crew pull in a small, severely damaged Cardassian vessel containing three passengers.
episodes.title: Profit and Loss

episodes.synopsis: The relative calm of Deep Space Nine is shattered by the arrival of three Klingon warriors.
episodes.title: Blood Oath

episodes.synopsis: The worst is feared when a Cardassian freighter, the Bok'Nor, explodes while departing the station.
episodes.title: The Maquis: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sisko, Kira and Bashir are held in a Maquis camp, but Gul Dukat is not there.
episodes.title: The Maquis: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: While having his weekly lunch with Bashir, Garak is suddenly overcome by extreme pain.
episodes.title: The Wire

episodes.synopsis: After experiencing operational difficulties while traveling through the wormhole, Kira and Bashir find themselves in an alternate universe.
episodes.title: Crossover

episodes.synopsis: Bajor is about to elect a new spiritual leader, and Kira's lover, Vedek Bareil, is the leading candidate.
episodes.title: The Collaborator

episodes.synopsis: While leaving for a vacation with Keiko, O'Brien encounters Boone, a former crewmate from the Rutledge.
episodes.title: Tribunal

episodes.synopsis: Sisko's plans for father-son bonding are ruined when Jake invites Nog to accompany them on a trip to the Gamma Quadrant.
episodes.title: The Jem'Hadar

episodes.synopsis: Preparing for possible invasion by the Jem'Hadar, Kira determines that Deep Space Nine lacks the firepower to defend itself.
episodes.title: The Search: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Odo and Kira have landed on a lone planet in the Omarion Nebula, which they have discovered is Odo's home world.
episodes.title: The Search: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: With bar business especially slow, Rom complains to Quark that their only customer, a Klingon named Kozak, says he's out of money.
episodes.title: The House of Quark

episodes.synopsis: While experimenting with a keyboard, the musically untrained Dax inexplicably plays a melody she seems to remember from somewhere.
episodes.title: Equilibrium

episodes.synopsis: Kira is surprised when she sees records indicating that she was incarcerated at Elemspur, a Cardassian prison, 10 years ago.
episodes.title: Second Skin

episodes.synopsis: A Boslic captain talks Quark into purchasing the wreckage of a ship that crashed in the Gamma Quadrant.
episodes.title: The Abandoned

episodes.synopsis: While working in the station's ore-processing unit, O'Brien and Jake accidently activate an automated Cardassian security program.
episodes.title: Civil Defense

episodes.synopsis: While exploring the Gamma Quadrant in the Defiant, Sisko, Dax, Bashir and O'Brien are shocked when a planet appears where none existed before.
episodes.title: Meridian

episodes.synopsis: When Cmdr. William Riker from the Enterprise visits the station, an intrigued Kira takes him on a tour, particularly of the Defiant.
episodes.title: Defiant

episodes.synopsis: The Bajoran Gratitude Festival, an annual celebration, is about to get underway, and both Kira and O'Brien await the arrival of their loves.
episodes.title: Fascination

episodes.synopsis: En route to a symposium in San Francisco, Sisko, Dax and Bashir are lost during transport to Earth from the Defiant.
episodes.title: Past Tense: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sisko, posing as Gabriel Bell in the 21st century, takes charge of the hostage situation in the Processing Center.
episodes.title: Past Tense: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When a serious accident nearly destroys a Bajoran transport arriving at the space station, Vedek Bareil is critically injured.
episodes.title: Life Support

episodes.synopsis: While travelling in a Runabout, Kira and Odo learn that a Maquis ship has ambushed a Lissepian vessel.
episodes.title: Heart of Stone

episodes.synopsis: Sisko is excited about working with two Cardassian scientists who are assigned to help deploy a subspace relay in the Gamma Quadrant.
episodes.title: Destiny

episodes.synopsis: Zek, the Ferengi Grand Nagus, pays a visit to Deep Space Nine and moves into Quark's quarters, where he takes on an important project.
episodes.title: Prophet Motive

episodes.synopsis: Romulans arrive to study reports on the Dominion, a privilege granted in exchange for the use of a cloaking device aboard the Defiant.
episodes.title: Visionary

episodes.synopsis: An alien named Altovar approaches Bashir to obtain a restricted substance. The doctor refuses, prompting Altovar to later break into the infirmary.
episodes.title: Distant Voices

episodes.synopsis: Sisko is abducted by a double of O'Brien, who takes him to the mirror universe that Kira and Bashir visited a year ago.
episodes.title: Through the Looking Glass

episodes.synopsis: A peaceful afternoon is shattered when Garak's shop is destroyed by an explosion.
episodes.title: Improbable Cause

episodes.synopsis: After rejoining his former Cardassian mentor, Enabran Tain, Garak helps him in a joint mission with the Obsidian Order and the Romulan Tal Shiar.
episodes.title: The Die Is Cast

episodes.synopsis: Sisko returns from a trip to Bajor with the blueprint for an ancient space vessel that operates like a sailboat, using solar pressure for propulsion.
episodes.title: Explorers

episodes.synopsis: An agent named Brunt from the Ferengi Commerce Authority serves Quark with a Writ of Accountability for improper supervision of a family member.
episodes.title: Family Business

episodes.synopsis: When the first minister of the Bajoran Provisional Government dies, Kai Winn is appointed to his duties and is about to be formally elected.
episodes.title: Shakaar

episodes.synopsis: Jadzia Dax prepares for her zhian'tara, the Trill Rite of Closure. During the ritual, Jadzia will meet Dax's previous hosts.
episodes.title: Facets

episodes.synopsis: During a party celebrating Sisko's promotion to captain, Adm. Krajensky takes him aside and quietly reveals that there has been a coup.
episodes.title: The Adversary

episodes.synopsis: The Promenade swarms with Klingons. However, the warriors aren't their antagonistic selves. Martok tells Sisko they've come to fight the Dominion.
episodes.title: The Way of the Warrior: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Aspiring writer Melanie wants to know why Jake Sisko stopped writing at 40. Jake explains how his father died in an accident and then reappeared.
episodes.title: The Visitor

episodes.synopsis: Returning from a mission in the Gamma Quadrant, Bashir and O'Brien respond to what they believe is a ship in trouble on a remote planet.
episodes.title: Hippocratic Oath

episodes.synopsis: A Bajoran smuggler tells Kira he has recovered metal that may be from a Cardassian ship that vanished six years ago with a group of Bajoran prisoners.
episodes.title: Indiscretion

episodes.synopsis: Sisko summons Dax to his office with serious news: A group of Trill scientists, led by Dr. Lenara Kahn, will use the Defiant to conduct experiments.
episodes.title: Rejoined

episodes.synopsis: Sisko and his officers take the Defiant to a remote system in the Gamma Quadrant for a trade discussion with the Karemma representative, Hanok.
episodes.title: Starship Down

episodes.synopsis: Quark is excited to receive a shuttle his cousin Gaila has owed him for 10 years, and decides to use it to fly Nog to Starfleet Academy on Earth.
episodes.title: Little Green Men

episodes.synopsis: Worf accompanies Dax and legendary Klingon warrior Kor on a mission to recover a mythical, millennium-old weapon of the Klingon Empire's first leader.
episodes.title: The Sword of Kahless

episodes.synopsis: Bashir is enjoying a holosuite program that casts him as a super suave, 1960s Earth secret agent when Garak intrudes on his fantasy.
episodes.title: Our Man Bashir

episodes.synopsis: An explosion at a Federation/Romulan diplomatic conference on Earth has killed 27 people, and there's evidence that the bomb was set by a Changeling.
episodes.title: Homefront

episodes.synopsis: When Dominion sabotage is blamed for a planetwide power outage, Starfleet stations troops all over Earth to prepare for an invasion.
episodes.title: Paradise Lost

episodes.synopsis: First Minister Shakaar arrives at Deep Space Nine to negotiate for Bajor's early admittance into the Federation, and he creates quite a stir.
episodes.title: Crossfire

episodes.synopsis: At First Minister Shakaar's request, Kira prepares to travel to a Cardassian outpost to share Bajoran intelligence about the Klingon Empire.
episodes.title: Return to Grace

episodes.synopsis: Worf's brother Kurn arrives unexpectedly and asks Worf to kill him. He explains that since Worf sided with the Federation, his family are outcasts.
episodes.title: Sons of Mogh

episodes.synopsis: After suffering for weeks with an ear infection without a day off, Rom finally collapses in Quark's bar and is taken to the infirmary.
episodes.title: Bar Associate

episodes.synopsis: A centuries-old Bajoran vessel mysteriously exits the wormhole, and its passenger, a legendary Bajoran poet, is immediately beamed to the infirmary.
episodes.title: Accession

episodes.synopsis: Worf faces a hearing to determine whether he should be extradited to the Klingon Empire for unwittingly destroying a civilian ship.
episodes.title: Rules of Engagement

episodes.synopsis: A shaken O'Brien returns to Deep Space Nine after his mind has been altered to make him believe that he spent the last two decades in prison.
episodes.title: Hard Time

episodes.synopsis: Jake can hardly believe his eyes when his father introduces him to a woman who looks, talks, and acts exactly like his late mother, Jennifer.
episodes.title: Shattered Mirror

episodes.synopsis: Lwaxana Troi visits Odo's office with the surprising news that she is pregnant. But her Tavnian husband insists he raise the son alone until he's 16.
episodes.title: The Muse

episodes.synopsis: With the conflict between the Klingons and Cardassians taking a toll, a shipment of replicators destined for Cardassia passes through Deep Space Nine.
episodes.title: For the Cause

episodes.synopsis: When a Jem'Hadar strike force attacks the station, Sisko takes Worf, Dax, Odo and O'Brien in the Defiant and pursues them into the Gamma Quadrant.
episodes.title: To the Death

episodes.synopsis: While traveling in the Gamma Quadrant, Kira, Dax and Bashir respond to a distress call from a planet that the Jem'Hadar destroyed 200 years ago.
episodes.title: The Quickening

episodes.synopsis: Quark returns from a visit to his homeworld with the distressing news that he has an extremely rare disease which will end a life within a week.
episodes.title: Body Parts

episodes.synopsis: Odo is rushed to the infirmary when he suddenly collapses. After an exam, Bashir determines that Odo is losing the ability to maintain his solid form.
episodes.title: Broken Link

episodes.synopsis: When Sisko approaches Starfleet Command with Odo's suspicion that Klingon Gowron is really one of Odo's people, he is told to expose the Changeling.
episodes.title: Apocalypse Rising

episodes.synopsis: While exploring a Gamma Quadrant world, Sisko, Dax, Worf and O'Brien watch as a Jem'Hadar warship crashes into the planet's surface.
episodes.title: The Ship

episodes.synopsis: While having a drink with Dax, Worf is taken by the sight of Grilka, a Klingon woman, as she enters the station with Tumek and her guard, Thopok.
episodes.title: Looking for Par'Mach in All the Wrong Places

episodes.synopsis: Jake Sisko's writing a profile of Dr. Bashir, and as they travel in a Runabout they get a distress call from a Federation colony under Klingon attack.
episodes.title: ...Nor the Battle to the Strong

episodes.synopsis: Meeting Keiko on her return from Bajor, O'Brien is shocked when his wife says that she is really an entity that has taken possession of Keiko's body.
episodes.title: The Assignment

episodes.synopsis: Darvin, a disgraced Klingon spy, travels back in time to alter some events to his likings. The DS9 crew must find what he's trying to change and prevent it without altering the time line.
episodes.title: Trials and Tribble-ations

episodes.synopsis: Worf's relationship with Dax hits a rough spot and he plans to discuss his feelings during their vacation on the "pleasure planet," Risa.
episodes.title: Let He Who Is Without Sin..

episodes.synopsis: Sisko, Odo, Dax and Garak are found unconscious. While Bashir attempts to revive their bodies they wake up during the Cardassian occupation of Bajor.
episodes.title: Things Past

episodes.synopsis: Forced to crash-land on a desolate planet, Odo and Quark learn they lost their communications system, replicator and most rations in an explosion.
episodes.title: The Ascent

episodes.synopsis: When Sisko sees a painting depicting B'hala, Bajor's legendary lost city, he is inspired to search for the famed site.
episodes.title: Rapture

episodes.synopsis: Kira's surprised when Latha Mabrin, a fellow member of her old resistance cell, is murdered. Her suspicions grow when she receives a recorded message.
episodes.title: The Darkness and the Light

episodes.synopsis: Kira finally goes into labor. But Odo is dealing with his own "baby" -- the former Changeling has purchased an ailing infant Changeling from Quark.
episodes.title: The Begotten

episodes.synopsis: Sisko encounters Michael Eddington, his former Starfleet Security Chief, who betrayed him and joined the Maquis.
episodes.title: For the Uniform

episodes.synopsis: The station picks up a coded message from the Gamma Quadrant that appears to be Cardassian. Garak reveals that it's a distress call from his mentor.
episodes.title: In Purgatory's Shadow

episodes.synopsis: As the station prepares for a Dominion attack, the enemy fleet suddenly turns toward Cardassian space. Gul Dukat's ship breaks formation and follows.
episodes.title: By Inferno's Light

episodes.synopsis: Bashir is chosen as the model for Starfleet's holographic doctor program. He is informed by Dr. Zimmerman, the scientist in charge of the project.
episodes.title: Doctor Bashir, I Presume?

episodes.synopsis: Odo meets a beautiful woman and is impressed by her powers of observation. He's surprised later when she tries to break into the station's computer.
episodes.title: A Simple Investigation

episodes.synopsis: Quark's cousin arrives at the station and offers a piece of his weapon-selling business -- which would pay off all of Quark's debts within a month.
episodes.title: Business as Usual

episodes.synopsis: Kira meets Tekeny Ghemor, a known Cardassian dissident, hoping he will lead the opposition to the Cardassian/Dominion alliance.
episodes.title: Ties of Blood and Water

episodes.synopsis: Depressed over his life -- especially being blacklisted by the Ferengi Commerce Authority -- Quark goes back home for some comfort from his mother.
episodes.title: Ferengi Love Songs

episodes.synopsis: General Martok receives orders from the Klingon High Council to search for a Klingon vessel, the B'Moth, missing near the Cardassian border.
episodes.title: Soldiers of the Empire

episodes.synopsis: In the Gamma Quadrant, Dax investigates a planet surrounded by an energy barrier, which cripples the Defiant and causes Kira to be duplicated.
episodes.title: Children of Time

episodes.synopsis: A secret message is delivered to Sisko. The few Maquis terrorists not wiped out by the Dominion initiate a massive retaliation against Cardassia.
episodes.title: Blaze of Glory

episodes.synopsis: With Deep Space Nine in disrepair, O'Brien is unable to replicate the Cardassian materials he needs, so he leads a salvage mission to a space station.
episodes.title: Empok Nor

episodes.synopsis: Hearing that Quark plans to auction off antiquities that include a vintage Willie Mays baseball card, Jake decides to obtain the card for his father.
episodes.title: In the Cards

episodes.synopsis: As another convoy of Jem'Hadar ships emerges from the wormhole toward Cardassia, Sisko realizes that the Dominion is taking over the Alpha Quadrant.
episodes.title: Call to Arms

episodes.synopsis: Several months into the war against the Dominion-Cardassian alliance, Sisko and crew are dejected as fleets of promised reinforcements are demolished.
episodes.title: A Time to Stand

episodes.synopsis: Traveling in a crippled Jem'Hadar warship, Sisko and his crew enter an uncharted nebula and crash on a desolate planet, where Dax is gravely wounded.
episodes.title: Rocks and Shoals

episodes.synopsis: Worf is shocked to see his estranged son, Alexander, among the new recruits when Klingon Gen. Martok docks his ship to take on reinforcements.
episodes.title: Sons and Daughters

episodes.synopsis: Sisko formulates a risky plan to disable a vital Dominion sensor array that's been monitoring all activity across five sectors.
episodes.title: Behind the Lines

episodes.synopsis: With morale sinking as the Federation continues to lose against the Dominion-Cardassian alliance, Sisko launches a plan to retake Deep Space Nine.
episodes.title: Favor the Bold

episodes.synopsis: With the minefield that protects the Federation soon to be demolished, Sisko leads what appears to be a suicide mission to take back Deep Space Nine.
episodes.title: Sacrifice of Angels

episodes.synopsis: Worf and Dax resume the planning of their long-awaited wedding -- which hinges on Martok's wife, Sirella, accepting Dax into the House of Martok.
episodes.title: You Are Cordially Invited ..

episodes.synopsis: The alternate-universe version of Kira's dead love beams aboard and takes her hostage, then reveals that he's running from his world's evil Alliance.
episodes.title: Resurrection

episodes.synopsis: With the secret of his genetically engineered past out in the open, Bashir is asked to work with others like him to help them assimilate into society.
episodes.title: Statistical Probabilities

episodes.synopsis: Quark's mother has been captured by the Dominion, and Grand Nagus Zek enlists Quark to rescue her, offering a substantial reward if he succeeds.
episodes.title: The Magnificent Ferengi

episodes.synopsis: As Sisko meets with former Cardassian leader Gul Dukat while en route to his war crimes hearing, their starship is destroyed by Cardassian troops.
episodes.title: Waltz

episodes.synopsis: The crew is shocked to learn that Morn has been killed in an ion storm. Seeing an opportunity for profit, Quark throws a memorial party at his bar.
episodes.title: Who Mourns for Morn?

episodes.synopsis: After a friend's ship is destroyed, Sisko contemplates leaving Starfleet while having visions of himself and his crew as sci-fi writers in the 1950s.
episodes.title: Far Beyond the Stars

episodes.synopsis: Dax, O'Brien and Bashir board a runabout that shrinks to only 4 inches long as they investigate a subspace phenomenon.
episodes.title: One Little Ship

episodes.synopsis: To find an informant, Starfleet Intelligence recruits Chief O'Brien to infiltrate the Orion Syndicate, the Alpha Quadrant's main organized crime ring.
episodes.title: Honor Among Thieves

episodes.synopsis: When Dax and Worf are sent to meet with a Cardassian double agent, they receive a coded subspace transmission from the operative, who wants to defect.
episodes.title: Change of Heart

episodes.synopsis: In order to learn the truth after a shocking revelation about her mother, Kira asks Sisko to let her consult the Bajoran Orb of Time.
episodes.title: Wrongs Darker than Death or Night

episodes.synopsis: Internal Affairs Officer Sloan arrives on the station looking for a possible security breach -- and promptly confines the senior staff to quarters.
episodes.title: Inquisition

episodes.synopsis: While reviewing casualty lists, Sisko realizes the only hope of winning the war is to persuade the Romulans to join the Federation-Klingon alliance.
episodes.title: In the Pale Moonlight

episodes.synopsis: Bashir shows off his new Holosuite character, a 1960s Las Vegas singer who performs in a lounge full of martini-swilling customers.
episodes.title: His Way

episodes.synopsis: After being called to Bajor when an ancient tablet addressing the Emissary is discovered, Sisko takes it back to Deep Space Nine for Dax to translate.
episodes.title: The Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: En route to Ferenginar, Jake and Nog are attacked by a Jem'Hadar vessel and rescued by a Defiant-class warship with elite Starfleet cadets in command.
episodes.title: Valiant

episodes.synopsis: Grand Nagus Zek arrives on the station to announce that he has added an amendment to the Ferengi Bill of Opportunities, giving women equal rights.
episodes.title: Profit and Lace

episodes.synopsis: O'Brien is reunited with his wife and their two children. But during a celebratory picnic on a nearby planet, 8-year-old Molly falls into a vortex.
episodes.title: Time's Orphan

episodes.synopsis: Aboard the Defiant, Sisko and the crew pick up a distress signal from Capt. Lisa Cusak, whose escape pod has crashed on a remote planet.
episodes.title: The Sound of Her Voice

episodes.synopsis: When Starfleet Command takes the offensive in the war against the Dominion, Sisko is chosen to lead the invasion of Cardassia.
episodes.title: Tears of the Prophets

episodes.synopsis: Three months after a possessed Gul Dukat killed Jadzia Dax and sealed the wormhole, life on Deep Space Nine has changed.
episodes.title: Image in the Sand

episodes.synopsis: Sisko meets Ezri, the new host of the Dax symbiont, before departing Earth for the planet Tyree with his father and son.
episodes.title: Shadows and Symbols

episodes.synopsis: In addition to coping with the memories of her "past lives," Ezri Dax must deal with the range of reactions her presence generates.
episodes.title: Afterimage

episodes.synopsis: Vulcan Capt. Solok brings his starship to Deep Space Nine for repairs made necessary from combat skirmishes.
episodes.title: Take Me Out to the Holo-Suite

episodes.synopsis: A group of genetically enhanced humans who were once under Bashir's care escape from their medical facility home.
episodes.title: Chrysalis

episodes.synopsis: Odo is lured to a secret meeting site, where he finds himself face-to-face with Weyoun, the Vorta leader of the enemy Dominion.
episodes.title: Treachery, Faith and the Great River

episodes.synopsis: To Worf's surprise, he is paid a visit by Kor, an aging Klingon war hero. Kor admits that his ambition has earned him countless enemies.
episodes.title: Once More Unto the Breach

episodes.synopsis: Sisko encounters Starfleet troops that have been decimated during their occupation of the largest Dominion communications array in the sector.
episodes.title: The Siege of AR-558

episodes.synopsis: Vedek Fala, a Bajoran monk and Kira's former teacher, pays her an unexpected visit. He gives Kira a crystal that transports her to Empok Nor.
episodes.title: Covenant

episodes.synopsis: After losing his leg in battle, Nog returns to the space station to recuperate. The crew tries to cheer him up, but the young ensign is struggling.
episodes.title: It's Only a Paper Moon

episodes.synopsis: Sisko is furious when he learns O'Brien has vanished while on a secret trip to New Sydney.
episodes.title: Prodigal Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Grand Negus Zek, ruler of the Ferengi Empire and paramour to Quark and Rom's mother, disappears while on a business trip to the Alternate Universe.
episodes.title: The Emperor's New Cloak

episodes.synopsis: A young lieutenant is found dead in his quarters. An investigation reveals he was shot with a TR-116 rifle, a weapon developed by Starfleet.
episodes.title: Field of Fire

episodes.synopsis: Odo returns from a conference with an unexpected guest: a Changeling who tracked and boarded his Runabout.
episodes.title: Chimera

episodes.synopsis: While relaxing in Vic Fontaine's Las Vegas holosuite lounge, O'Brien and Bashir are surprised by the arrival of mobster Frankie Eyes.
episodes.title: Badda-Bing Badda-Bang

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Bashir is visited by Sloan, the director of Section 31, a secret and unsanctioned extremist entity within Starfleet Intelligence.
episodes.title: Inter Arma Enim Silent Leges

episodes.synopsis: As Sisko revels in the purchase of Bajoran land, word reaches the station that Worf is missing in action after a fierce battle.
episodes.title: Penumbra: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Kai Winn arrives at the station to "assist" Sisko with his wedding, and he admits the Prophets warned he would face a great trial in his future.
episodes.title: Till Death Do Us Part: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Worf and Ezri are beamed aboard a Jem'Hadar ship, where the Female Shapeshifter and Thot Gor prepare to sign a treaty to end the war.
episodes.title: Strange Bedfellows: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The crew's relief at Worf and Ezri's safe return is tempered by reports that the Breen have attacked Starfleet Headquarters on Earth.
episodes.title: The Changing Face of Evil: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Eager to aid Damar's rebel movement against the Dominion, Sisko orders Kira to put her antipathy for the Cardassian aside and train his staff.
episodes.title: When It Rains ...: Part 5

episodes.synopsis: While Kira reviews tactical plans with the Cardassian Resistance leaders, Odo returns from a mission weakened by the disease that's ravaging his race.
episodes.title: Tacking Into the Wind: Part 6

episodes.synopsis: When Kira brings a terminally ill Odo back to the station for treatment, he orders her to leave him and return to help the Cardassian Resistance.
episodes.title: Extreme Measures: Part 7

episodes.synopsis: While Sisko takes command of a new ship named in honor of the Defiant, Kira, Garak and Damar barely escape a Dominion ambush on Cardassia.
episodes.title: The Dogs of War: Part 8

episodes.synopsis: With Sisko in command, the Defiant joins the Federation-Klingon-Romulan fleet as the invasion of Cardassia is launched.
episodes.title: What You Leave Behind: Parts 1 & 2
